attributes.action: Prevent the Government disregarding Creative subjects in Education.
attributes.background: Creative subjects such as Performing Arts, Art and Media Studies are vital to development in education. They build confidence, improve relationships and increase awareness of British Values and Culture Worldwide! This also helps to embrace diversity.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Parliament or Government to take. If you would like creative subjects to form part of the EBacc, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/111731
